standardsList: The software complies with ISO 37002, specific whistleblowing standard defined in 2021. It as well implement whistleblowing procedures in relation to many national and international laws and in particular in relation to the Directive (EU) 2019/1937; Within its implementation it uses only standard protocols defined by the IETF
